Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 110th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1976...
Injured on 4/10/1983 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/14/1984 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 4/26/1985 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/7/1986 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1987, off Freeman Vosburg (SHP)...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Released by Ashburn on 8/4/1988...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 3/1/1989 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/1/1989 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/22/1990 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Pontiac to New Jersey on 6/23/1990 (Going to NJ: SS C. Prange. Going to PON: P R. Quinney, P T. Omara, P J. Bryant)...
